quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Bread and Country
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, country, carrots. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What nutrient essential for the human body does spinach contain in large quantities?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: What type of flour is used for the preparation of the Thai bread Khanom bueang?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rice flour

questions.question: Onions will not prove beneficial for treating which of the following conditions?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stomach ulcer

questions.question: In what country did the bread called Pane carasau originate?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Italy

questions.question: What essential vitamin is supplied through the consumption of carrots?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Vitamin A

questions.question: In what Arab country did the Sangak bread variety originate?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Iran

questions.question: What type of bread is the German bread variety called Dampfnudel?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: White bread

questions.question: How is the traditional Jamaican bread called Bammy prepared?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: By frying

questions.question: What makes the Vienna bread so light and airy?

options.text: Lots of baking soda is added.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Steam is used during baking.

questions.question: The regular consumption of cauliflower is proven to prevent this disease.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cancer

questions.question: Eggplant, also known as aubergine, is a close relative of this other plant.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tobacco

questions.question: In what Asian country was the Melonpan bread variety invented?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Japan

questions.question: Why should the consumption of celery seeds and oil be avoided during pregnancy?

options.text: They may be toxic to the fetus.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They may trigger uterine contractions.

questions.question: What important health benefit does cooked sweet corn provide?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It is rich in antioxidants.

questions.question: On what major holiday is the sweet bread Tsoureki eaten in Greece?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Type and Preparation
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, condition, making. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Why would Romans and Egyptians eat some lettuce leaves after dinner?

options.text: To improve the braking down of fats

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: To stimulate sleep

questions.question: Which of these is used to color the traditional Spanish dish Arroz negro, or paella negra, black?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cephalopod ink

questions.question: What type of meat is used for the preparation of the traditional Spanish dish Cocido Madrileno?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: What important vitamin does asparagus contain?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Vitamin B9

questions.question: In what shape is the Spanish dessert Tortell traditionally prepared?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: O-shape

questions.question: In the treatment of what medical condition are radishes used in alternative medicine?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: What type of food is the Spanish dish called Escalivada, which originated in Catalonia, Spain?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Salad

questions.question: What type of fat is used for the preparation of the popular Chiffon cake?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Butter

questions.question: On what holiday is the Spanish dessert called turron traditionally eaten?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Christmas

questions.question: What type of pasta is used for the making of the popular Spanish dish Fideua?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Vermicelli

questions.question: What vegetable is the main ingredient of the traditional Spanish soup Gazpacho?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tomato

questions.question: What type of nuts is used for the preparation of the traditional Spanish pie Tarta de Santiago?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Almonds

questions.question: Why was the Angel food cake, also known as Angel Cake, called so?

options.text: Because the creator of the recipe was named Angela

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Because it is very light

questions.question: What vegetables are used for the preparation of the traditional Spanish stew Fabada Asturiana?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Beans

questions.question: What type of fish is traditionally used for the making of the Spanish stew called Marmitako?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tuna

questions.question: In how many provinces is the Dominican Republic divided?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 31

questions.question: What type of cake is also known as the King of Cakes?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Baumkuchen

questions.question: #5 on the list of highest-grossing films is a musical which takes place in Austria. It was made in 1965 and grossed $2,269,800,000. Sing the scales for me on a hill top.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Sound of Music

questions.question: What fruits are added between the layers as well as on top of the Black Forest cake?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cherries

questions.question: What is the famous Hungarian cake, called Dobos torte, topped with?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Caramel slices

questions.question: #8 on the list of highest-grossing films is a 1965 film about the Russian Revolution in 1917-1918 and grossed $1,988,600,000.

options.text: October: Ten Days That Shook the World

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Doctor Zhivago

questions.question: # 9 on the list of highest-grossing films is this 1975 film that earned $1,945,100,000 and scared the pants off most of the audience. In fact, people swimming in the ocean dropped that year.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jaws

options.text: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan

options.text: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs

questions.question: Which of these is added to the ingredients of the Devils food cake to raise the pH level of the batter and deepen its color?

questions.question: #7 on the list of highest-grossing films was this 1956 religious film starring Charlton Heston. It grossed $2,098,600,000.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Ten Commandments

questions.question: In what country is the popular Spice cake believed to have originated?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: the United States

questions.question: In what country did the recipe for the Tiramisu cake originate?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Italy

questions.question: What vegetable is used for the preparation of the Passion Cake, which probably originated in the United Kingdom?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Carrot

questions.question: What is the other name for the sponge cake called Battenberg cake?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Window cake

quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Pope and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, college, title. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: How many votes from the College of Cardinals does it take to declare a new Pope?

options.text: Half of the votes plus one
Two thirds of the votes plus one

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Two thirds of the votes plus one

questions.question: Who was the first pope to change his name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pope John II, formerly Mercury

questions.question: What movie title was translated i Portugal as A Very Crazy Dead Man?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Weekend at Bernies

questions.question: Popes have always been elected to their position by the College of Cardinals.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: All cardinals are appointed to their positions by a pope. Can they all vote for a new pope when the time comes?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: No

questions.question: Urban VII set a record for the shortest papacy. How many days was he in office?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 12 days

questions.question: Can any baptized male be elected Pope?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: What was the longest interregnum between popes?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Two years and 9 months

questions.question: The 8th Passenger is Death is the Hungarian title of this movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Alien

questions.question: A Supertough Kangaroo is the Spanish title of this movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Pacifier

questions.question: Breaking the Ice is the Spanish title of this movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Happy Feet

questions.question: Airport Attack is the Portuguese title of this movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Die Hard 2

questions.question: Why do popes wear white?

options.text: It was a fashion trend in 1566 brought on by the newly elected Pope Pius V.
It is easy to recognize him in a crowd.
It signifies that the pope will not get dirty.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It was a fashion trend in 1566 brought on by the newly elected Pope Pius V.

questions.question: White smoke has always been used to announce the choosing of a new pope.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: If you were elected pope, what would your chances of becoming a saint be?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1 out of 3

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Holidays and Plane
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, coin, s. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: The airlines have become so cash-strapped, they charged me for ___________.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: my emotional baggage

questions.question: I dated a politician over the holidays but when I wrapped myself up as a present, he couldnt __________________.

options.text: understand what he was supposed to do since his aides were on vacation
get a committee organized to suggest a solution
tear himself away from his cell phone

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: cut through the red tape

questions.question: I missed my miniature Indian musical instrument practice last night. I couldnt find a ___________.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: baby sitar

questions.question: If you get sick at the airport it could be a _____________.

options.text: disaster for the folks around you

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: terminal illness

questions.question: I made a pun in springtime. (Next sentence, please)
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It was a May zing.

questions.question: Two coin collectors got together for _______________.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: old dimes sake

questions.question: Traveling on a flying carpet is a ______________.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: rugged experience

questions.question: Dont expect to eat something fancy when youre flying ___________________.

options.text: unless you bring your own food

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: because its plane food

questions.question: I think Santa has riverfront property in Brazil. All our presents came from ____________.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Amazon this year

questions.question: If I tell you I’m afraid of apple orchards, will you tell me to ______________?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: grow a pear

questions.question: When asked by a passenger how high he would get, the pilot replied,
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: I dont do drugs.

questions.question: Magician’s assistants are _______________.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: highly sawed after

questions.question: I try wearing tight jeans, but I can __________________.

options.text: gain weight while they are on my body.
not stand anything that sticks out

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: never pull it off

questions.question: If you step onto a plane and recognize a friend of yours named Jack dont yell out ______!

options.text: Man you look heavier than ever

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hi Jack

questions.question: When I found out that the fire department was charging $75.00 per table for their craft fair I told them _________________.

options.text: that it seemed steep to me
they could stick it where the sun dont shine

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: they could go to blazes
